task-wr.title: Displaying Provider Network Information
task-wr.shortdesc: You can view provider network details from the Web administration interface or the CLI. You can also view provider network topologies from the Web administration interface.

context.p: US75601 explain alternatives for GUI.Using the Web administration interface, you can obtain information about provider networks in two places:

li.p: The Provider Network Topology view. This is a graphical representation of all provider networks on the system and their connections to compute hosts. You can select individual provider networks to view details. You can also review active alarms for provider network connections. For more information, see .

note.p: You cannot make changes from this view.

li.p: The Provider Networks page. This is a list of all provider networks on the system and their settings and segmentation ranges. You can select an individual provider network to view details, and you can create and edit provider networks and segmentation ranges.

context.p: Both places use the Provider Network Details tab to present details. If you prefer, you can view the details using the CLI; for more information, see .

step.cmd: From the left pane menu, select Admin Platform Provider Networks .
Click the name of the provider network to open the Provider Network Overview page.

info.p: Details for the provider network are displayed, including any associated segmentation ranges and tenant networks.
